outcome: All identified architectural flaws and associated law enforcements related to WebBank membership have been addressed. The project now aligns better with `laws.md` without any UI changes.
new_features: Introduced a dedicated `WebBankMembership` model for proper WebBank membership management.
Implemented an application process for WebBank membership with eligibility and cap enforcement.
Enforced WebBank member cap (LAW 4) during both application and admin activation.
Implemented automatic WebBank membership revocation upon AMOR108 GOLD pool downgrade (LAW 3).
issues_addressed: Resolved architectural flaw of using `members.models.Member` for WebBank membership.
Ensured correct enforcement of LAW 1 (Single Identity) for WebBank members.
Ensured correct enforcement of LAW 2 (SACCO Layer Law) for WebBank membership applications.
Ensured correct enforcement of LAW 3 (Gold Pool Eligibility Law) at application and via signals.
Ensured correct enforcement of LAW 4 (WebBank Member Cap Law) at application and in admin.
